name: Intro
_source: speak;Reimu;You seem really excited to get to this place, don't you?
speak;Mima;*Maybe* I'm just a little excited to stop walking and fighting.
speak;Marisa;Lady Mima, with all due respect... you have no legs.
speak;Mima;It doesn't make it any easier, you know!
speak;Marisa;Yeah, I figured this was coming.
speak;Marisa;Let me guess, you're gonna ask why we're headin' this way, aren't ya?
speak;Marisa;Called it! Reimu, you owe me five mon.
speak;Marisa;Says me! I called it first.
speak;Reimu;You can't just call a bet out of nowhere!|That's not how it works!
speak;Youmu;Excuse me! I'm under orders from the mistress to not let anyone pass.
speak;Marisa;Huh, you'd think someone like her would be more inviting.
speak;Reimu;Or the type to adopt a closed borders policy.
speak;Lyrica;Wait, weren't we invited to play for her?|Something isn't adding up.
speak;Marisa;Hmm, that is pretty strange, isn't it?
speak;Youmu;Hey, are you guys even listening?
speak;Marisa;Nah, we're trying to solve one of life's greatest questions.
speak;Youmu;But didn't I already answer it?
speak;Marisa;"No" isn't a good answer. Try again.
